trans-unit.source: Event type
Add event data
Please choose an event type
You must first select an event type so that the corresponding input fields can be displayed on the following pages.
Single event
Durational event
Recurring event
Event data
Event type
Add event times
Title
The title is a mandatory field. It should identify the event as clearly as possible.
Event begin
The start date is a mandatory field. Click on the calendar icon to open the Date Value Wizard.
Event end
For durational events, the event end date is a mandatory field. Click on the calendar icon to open the Date Value Wizard.
Last date of recurring event
For recurring events we recommend setting an end date. However, this is not mandatory. Click on the calendar icon to open the Date Value Wizard.
Event time
Here you can add a start time to the event. Use the format hh:mm. If it is a recurring event, this time will be valid for every day.
Teaser
Enter a short description here. This will be used as description text in event overviews.
Description
Enter a detailed description here. This will be displayed as description text in the detail view.
Ticket link
Enter a link to the ticket sale here. Please transfer the complete link incl. https://
Event Location
The venue is a required field. Please enter the first times of the location in the field and select the appropriate location from the list.
Download link
Here you can add a link to a program booklet, for example.
YouTube link
Here you can add a link to a YouTube video.
Categories
Categories are a required field. Select min. 1 but max. 3 categories.
Weekday
The days of the week are a required field. Select at least one day of the week. The event will then appear every week on the specified weekdays.
1st image upload
You can add up to 2 images to the event.
Transfer usagerights of first image
2nd image upload
You can add up to 2 images to the event.
Transfer usagerights of second image
Define further event times each weekday
Add event data
Choose a different start time for events on Monday. Use the format hh:mm.
Choose a different start time for events on Tuesday. Use the format hh:mm.
Choose a different start time for events on Wednesday. Use the format hh:mm.
Choose a different start time for events on Thursday. Use the format hh:mm.
Choose a different start time for events on Friday. Use the format hh:mm.
Choose a different start time for events on Saturday. Use the format hh:mm.
Choose a different start time for events on Sunday. Use the format hh:mm.
This field is a mandatory field!
This field is a mandatory field!
This field is a mandatory field!
This field is a mandatory field!
You must select between %s to %s elements.
